modShortDescription: This modification adds to the game some options of motorcycle with different armor, as well as change some features of other vehicles.
modDescription:
This modification adds to the game some options of motorcycle with different armor, as well as change some features of other vehicles.

## Changes

* Now you can buy a motorcycle completely without armor and then add armor on the workbench.
* Depending on the amount of armor, the motorcycle has a different strength.
* Depending on the amount of armor, the motorcycle has a different speed.
* Icons of different variations of motorcycles modified to be easier to navigate you in recipes list.

## Additionally

All transport is much less strength than the vanilla version:

* Bike – 50
* Minibike – 100
* 4×4 jeep – 900
* Motorcycle without armor – 350
* Motorcycle with armor wheel – 400
* Motorcycle armor with wheels – 500
* Motorcycle with armor and spikes – 600

Also, two versions and recipes of these modifications have been added:

* Modification of the “Fuel Economy”
* Modification of the “Brightness Headlights”

Modification created on the basis of modifications [Motorcycle Alterations](https://7daystodiemods.com/motorcycle-alterations/) v1.3 (A19) from Eric Beaudoin. Thanks Eric Beaudoin!

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1RFYwMhkYEL8-skKDhzZj_9r2fKiRrdln)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20252-motorcycle-alterations-v16-survager-overwork/).

**Credits:** [Survager](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/survager/)
